subject: Boxing
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko withdrew from his W.B.O. and I.B.F. heavyweight title defense against the British challenger Dereck Chisora because of a torn muscle in his back.
snippet: Wladimir Klitschko withdrew from his W.B.O. and I.B.F. heavyweight title defense against the British challenger Dereck Chisora because of a torn muscle in his back.
